post.text:
For respect.
For the future.
For our planet.

On Tuesday, they're gonna hear us roar: hillaryclinton.com/makeaplan

comment.author: Breanna
comment.text: Hillary got rained on today in Florida and stopped the rally. Trump gets escorted off by secret service because of a security issue and is back within minutes!! That's our president!!! He has the courage and stamina to lead us back to a great and powerful America!!! #TrumpTrain #MAGA #NeverHillary

replies.author: Mariah
replies.text: Whew! Thanks, Breanna! That's exactly the action I was looking for to decide who I would vote for. This certainly points up that we should not be worried that he has no experience or talent for the job. He got right back in front of his adoring crowds! Yay! Stay adorable. I'm with her.

replies.author: Breanna
replies.text: To be fair, wicked witches melt in rain/water. Can't blame her for ending early.

replies.author: Anthony
replies.text: Mariah : I love the fact that your delicious irony was lost on Ms üëè
